author: hwright
msg: Always provide a wc_ctx, instead of intentionally passing NULL and then
(svn_client__get_diff_editor): Assume we'll always have a wc_ctx.
(svn_client__get_diff_editor): Update the docs to reflect the above.
(diff_repos_repos): Pass our existing wc_ctx in place of NULL.

author: joeswatosh
msg: Try to get the buildbot for the bindings past the segfault in the ruby
tests so the error and failure messages are reported.
(SvnTestWc#test_adm_ensure): Flunk the test before the segfault.

author: hwright
msg: Remove an unused access baton function, folding it into its sole caller.
(svn_wc_adm_retrieve): Fold the above into this function.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r40077, resolve a possible NULL reference error and
add the previously removed absolute path check.

author: rhuijben
msg: Remove the unused wc_db status svn_wc__db_status_moved_away, and allow
passing NULL output arguments to svn_wc__db_scan_deletion().
Remove assertions and conditionalize setting output arguments.
Update svn_wc__db_status_added with suggestions from julianfoad.
Update documentation for allowing NULL arguments.
